column5: Definition:  Total 'Sexual violence” means rape and sexual assault; including sexual offences against children
Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of China
The former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia

column2: Please note that when using the figures, any cross-national comparisons should be conducted with caution because of the differences that exist between the legal definitions of offences in countries, or the different methods of offence counting and recording.
* Changes in definitions and/or counting rules are reported by the Member State to indicate a break in the time series.
column4: * Changes in definitions and/or counting rules are reported by the Member State to indicate a break in the time series.
